rows.label: qst001301_msg0001
rows.name: *Sigh* What am I supposed to do...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0002
rows.name:
Hey, welcome. Though I'm not really
in a state to be welcoming anyone.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0003
rows.name:
We've got a bit of a problem.
Business is completely dead.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0005
rows.name:
It's got nothing to
do with you, though.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0006
rows.name:
Huh? You don't have to...
wait, are you a Driver?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0007
rows.name: This is perfect!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0008
rows.name:
The thing is, a certain monster has
been breeding in Gwenith Paddies
lately, so we can't harvest any Folta.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0009
rows.name:
I don't know the details, but apparently some mercenary
group called the Wildschwein Mercenaries killed too
many of that monster's (temp) natural predators...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0010
rows.name:
Anyway, without Fons Rice, I
can't make my signature dish.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0011
rows.name:
So now, the shop is dead
quiet, and we've been
basically closed for business.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0012
rows.name:
Me and my employees are
at our wits' end...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0013
rows.name:
So I was wondering, you
look pretty capable.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0014
rows.name:
Would you be willing to
take on a job for me?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0015
rows.name:
I need you to defeat those monsters
(temp) in Gwenith Paddies.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0016
rows.name:
Don't worry, I'll make sure
to reward you properly.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0017
rows.name: What do you say? Will you take the job?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0018
rows.name: Oh! Really?! That's a huge help!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0019
rows.name:
Well then, I'm counting
on you, brother!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0101
rows.name: What's up, brother? Lost in life?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0102
rows.name:
My request is to defeat the
enemies (temp) that have been
breeding in Gwenith Paddies.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0103
rows.name: I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0201
rows.name:
Hmm? What's wrong, brother?
Did you forget something?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0202
rows.name:
Or have you already defeated
those monsters (temp)?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0203
rows.name:
Hahaha, just kidding. Even for a
great Driver, defeating that many
in such a short time is...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0204
rows.name:
...Huh? What did you just say?
You're not telling me you're
finished, are you? No, but... really?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0205
rows.name:
No way, you're kidding me. I had
no idea you were this skilled.
Wait, then... does this mean...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0207
rows.name:
I told you this place was basically
closed for business, right?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0208
rows.name:
Naturally, as the manager,
I have to cut down on these
losses. As a result...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0209
rows.name: I have no employees!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0210
rows.name:
I, uh, I fired too many of them...
I mean, who would've thought
you'd solve this so quickly?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0211
rows.name:
This shop has been in my family since my
great-grandfather. It was a decision I made
because I couldn't let it go under...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0212
rows.name: It completely backfired...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0213
rows.name: But it's too early to give up, brother!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0214
rows.name:
While I call back my employees,
would you be willing to help out?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0215
rows.name:
You're already in this deep. I'll
double your reward. What do you say?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0216
rows.name: Really! Thank you!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0217
rows.name:
Well then, to get started, I have
an order from a regular customer. I
need you to get the ingredients.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0218
rows.name:
Giant Frog Meat (temp)
and Fusty Fungus.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0219
rows.name:
I always order the Fusty
Fungus from Hræsvelgr.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0220
rows.name:
The problem is the Giant
Frog Meat (temp).

rows.label: qst001301_msg0221
rows.name:
You should be able to get it
by defeating the ××× in ○○○.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0222
rows.name:
I hear they're a bit tough,
but I'm sure you'll be fine.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0223
rows.name:
Yeah! I'm counting on you!
Man, you're a real lifesaver!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0224
rows.name: I'm counting on you, brother!

rows.label: qst001302_msg0301
rows.name:
Calling back employees
is quite a hassle...

rows.label: qst001302_msg0302
rows.name:
How's it going with the Giant Frog
Meat (temp) and Fusty Fungus?

rows.label: qst001302_msg0303
rows.name:
I always order the Fusty
Fungus from Hræsvelgr.

rows.label: qst001302_msg0304
rows.name:
You should be able to get
Giant Frog Meat (temp) by
defeating the ××× in ○○○.

rows.label: qst001302_msg0305
rows.name: I'm counting on you, brother!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0401
rows.name: Hey! I've been waiting for you!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0402
rows.name:
Let's get cooking right away.
Once it's done, could you
deliver it to the customer?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0403
rows.name:
There you go, one and done!
A Lovely Brog Sauté!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0404
rows.name:
The brog's eyes are cute, right? The
color is pretty appetizing too...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0405
rows.name: Hmm? What's wrong? Are you hungry?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0406
rows.name:
I get it, I get it. With something
this delicious in front of you,
making a delivery is a tough task.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0407
rows.name:
...I could make you one
if you like. You've been
a big help, after all.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0408
rows.name:
W-what's with the silence...?
You don't want it? You
don't have to be shy.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0409
rows.name: Come on, doesn't it look delicious?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0410
rows.name:
The tantalizing aroma, the overflowing
juices when you bite in... How about
it! You want some, don't you?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0411
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0412
rows.name: Say you'd like to try it sometime.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0413
rows.name: Firmly refuse.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0414
rows.name:
Oh! I see, I see! If you're
going to say that, I have
to treat you to some.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0415
rows.name:
Hehehe, look forward to
it. I'll prepare a slowly
aged one just for you.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0416
rows.name: O-oh...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0417
rows.name:
That's odd. To not even glance
at a Lovely Brog Sauté.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0418
rows.name:
I was thinking of making your reward
a year's supply of Lovely Brog Sauté,
but maybe I should reconsider...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0419
rows.name:
Well, for now, let's focus
on the task at hand.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0420
rows.name: Could you deliver this to Svandin-san?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0421
rows.name:
He's at the Invidian army
barracks near Fons Maim Port.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0422
rows.name: I'm counting on you, brother!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0501
rows.name:
Hmm? Did you forget the
delivery location?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0502
rows.name:
He's at the Invidian army
barracks near Fons Maim Port.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0503
rows.name:
Deliver it to Svandin-san for
me. I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0601
rows.name:
Hey brother! Looks like you
handled the delivery just
fine. You really saved me.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0602
rows.name:
Thanks to you, it looks like I can
get the shop back on its feet.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0603
rows.name: Now, about your reward...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0604
rows.name: I'll give you my shop's secret recipe.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0605
rows.name:
Of course, it's the recipe
for the Lovely Brog Sauté!

rows.label: qst001301_msg0606
rows.name:
I thought about it a lot, but I have
to properly thank my benefactor.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0607
rows.name:
I'm sure my great-grandfather
would forgive me for giving
our recipe to you, brother.

rows.label: qst001301_msg0608
rows.name: What's wrong, brother? You look pale...

rows.label: qst001301_msg0609
rows.name: Are you tired from working so much?

rows.label: qst001301_msg0610
rows.name:
Have some Lovely Brog Sauté to
get your energy back, yeah?
